name: Cappuccino
description: A classic Italian coffee drink with rich, bold espresso topped with a thick layer of steamed milk.

name: Latte
description: A smooth and creamy coffee drink with steamed milk and a light layer of foam.

name: Espresso
description: A rich, dark, and concentrated coffee made from finely ground coffee beans.

name: Green Tea
description: A refreshing tea made from unoxidized green tea leaves, known for its light flavor and health benefits.

name: Black Tea
description: A full-bodied tea made from oxidized black tea leaves, perfect for those who enjoy bold flavors.

name: Mocha
description: A decadent combination of espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk, perfect for those with a sweet tooth.

name: Americano
description: A simple yet bold coffee made by diluting espresso with hot water.

name: Chai Latte
description: A spiced tea beverage mixed with steamed milk, offering a warm and comforting flavor.

name: Iced Coffee
description: A refreshing cold coffee drink brewed over ice, perfect for a hot day.

name: Frappuccino
description: A blended coffee drink with milk, ice, and syrup, topped with whipped cream for extra indulgence.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: A rich and creamy hot drink made with steamed milk and melted chocolate, perfect for cold days.

name: Herbal Tea
description: A calming tea made from a blend of herbs and spices, offering a soothing and aromatic experience.

name: Matcha Latte
description: A vibrant green tea latte made with finely ground matcha and steamed milk, offering a smooth and earthy flavor.

name: Eggnog Latte
description: A festive latte made with rich eggnog, steamed milk, and a shot of espresso, perfect for the holiday season.

name: Chicken Soup
description: A warm, hearty chicken soup made with tender chicken, fresh vegetables, and a flavorful broth.
